doc:
Lydia Sherwood https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lydia_Sherwood 0 Lydia Sherwood (5 May 1906 – 20 April 1989) was a British film actress and stage actress. She made her debut on stage in Daisy Fisher's comedy play Lavender Ladies. She was married to the poet Lazarus Aaronson from 1924 to 1931. Lydia_Sherwood ( 5_May_1906 – 20_April_1989 ) was a_British_film_actress_and_stage_actress . She made her_debut on stage in Daisy_Fisher 's_comedy_play_Lavender_Ladies . She was_married to the_poet_Lazarus_Aaronson from 1924 to 1931 .
